com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

Class SaveLoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.SaveLoad

  • public class SaveLoad
extends java.lang.Object
    Saves and loads the Account to the SD card using gson into a file called "file.sav"

    Code from the CMPUT 301 labs. University of Alberta: TA's Joshua Campbell, Shida He, Stephen Romansky, and Ian Watts, 2015-16-10

    See Also:
    Account
